attributes.action: Ban neonicotinoids sale to the general public.
attributes.additional_details:
To help stop the reduction in insect biomass on our planet.
Without  insects nearly all this planets environmental systems will fail.
attributes.background:
Make the sale of neonicotiniods to the general public illegal, many insect  
Pest control products contain these lethal substances, unfortunately most people are unaware of this.
Leading to over use and unnecessary 
Destruction of the planets insect biomass.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Continue the ban on the use of Neonicotinoids: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/563943

Overturn the decision to allow the use of neonicotinoid pesticides: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/569214
